name: Sprout
description: A social gardening application  to connect with their community and learn more about the ecosystem around them.

name: CapWise
description: CapWise introduces a crowd occupancy counter for retail spaces that will make use of counted data for staff scheduling and marketing purposes.

name: Namu
description: Featuring in-house made pixel art and 8-bit tunes, this pixel-game takes players on a journey with the baby blue whale, Namu, who is searching for his home.

name: Bóriya
description: Begin your adventure as a being in the forest of Bóriya. This text-based adventure is inspired by Dungeons & Dragons. Players will have to train by battling monsters until they are strong enough to defeat the void that has consumed the forest.

name: Olà Chat
description: A front-end prototype of an anonymous peer-support chat app created with peer support in mind, providing people a space to speak with peers who have similar identities and experiences.
